Infer on Test Set

{% raw %}

infer_on_test_set[source]

infer_on_test_set(learn:Learner)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path, df = load_data()
dls = get_dls(path, df)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn = cnn_learner(dls, resnet18)
infer_on_test_set(learn).shape

torch.Size([1821, 4])
{% endraw %}

Format Submission

{% raw %}

format_submission[source]

format_submission(preds:Tensor, save_path:Union[Path, str])

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fake_preds = torch.zeros(1821, 4)
save_path = format_submission(fake_preds, "TESTING.csv"); save_path

Path('TESTING.csv')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert save_path.exists()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
save_path.unlink()
{% endraw %}

All-in-One Learner -> Submission Function

{% raw %}

evaluate[source]

evaluate(learn:Learner, save_path:Union[Path, str]=Path('submission.csv'))

Takes trained learner, evaluates on test set, formats and saves submission.csv.
